title: Reflection across the x-axis
text: For the parent function f(x) $$=$$ $$b^x$$, a reflection across the y-axis is represented by g(x) $$=$$ $$b^{-x}$$.
speech: For the parent function f(x)  is equal to,   b to the x-th , a reflection across the y-axis is represented by g(x)  is equal to,  , b raised to the negative x power .

, a reflection across the y-axis is represented by g(x)   is equal to,
, b raised to the negative x power
